snippet.title: Worldwide Arts Society [Trailer]
snippet.description:
Learn more & Download: https://antoine-ramo.itch.io/worldwide-arts-society

Worldwide Arts Society is an incremental deck-building game. It allows you to control exactly what its name suggests: choose which artists to enroll, which currents to follow, which art forms to develop, and your arts society might soar! The adventure begins in 1799 with founding figures such as Francisco Goya or Germaine de Staël, and hits the 21st century with Beyoncé and Bong Joon-Ho. Each artist has several different effects on the society's influence. This game is a solo project by Antoine Ramo.
